backend_eslint_mismatch.description: Backend uses ESLint v8 dependencies but frontend uses ESLint v9 flat config. Inconsistent linting configuration across monorepo.
backend_eslint_mismatch.recommendation: Upgrade backend ESLint to v9 and add eslint.config.js for consistency

root_src_directory_cleanup.description: Root-level src/ directory exists but contains no TypeScript source files. Appears to be placeholder or legacy directory.
root_src_directory_cleanup.recommendation: Verify if directory is needed. If not, remove to reduce codebase clutter.

mysterious_n_directory.description: Directory containing only CLAUDE.md file exists at root, backend, and frontend levels. Likely development artifact from automated process.
mysterious_n_directory.recommendation: Remove N/ directories from all locations and add to .gitignore

aes_crypto_placeholder.description: AES encryption module has complete type signatures but throws 'Not implemented' errors. Tracked by issue #13.
aes_crypto_placeholder.recommendation: Implement using WebCrypto API for AES-256-GCM encryption

received_amount_fallback.description: getReceivedAmount function returns fallback value pending LWK API maturity. Real received amount detection not yet implemented.
received_amount_fallback.recommendation: Implement when LWK provides reliable UTXO query API

lib_features_tracking_obsolete.description: Previous sessions tracked lib/features/ directory which no longer exists in codebase. Updated in session 4.
